messages.title: Labour's Cancer Guarantee
messages.content: Labour will improve on the 2-week max wait from GP referral to cancer specialist.

messages.title: Lucy's Tuition Fee Pledge
messages.content: Labour will oppose any move to increase the cap on tuition fees.

messages.title: Action on bad landlords
messages.content: Labour will introduce a national register of landlords to help drive up standards.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will vote for reform of the expenses system and publish monthly accounts.
Pledged to work hard and keep in touch with local people; that's a guarantee.
Will keep fighting for the local NHS, Sure Start and Metrolink.
Will always put community first and make a difference.
Above cost shops; only Government-Labour can stop it.

issues.health: Will keep fighting for the local NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: Will keep fighting for... Sure Start...; that's a guarantee.

housing.content: Labour will introduce a national register of landlords to help drive up standards.

images.caption: Labour's Lucy Powell and Council Leader Sir Richard Leese inspect work on the Metrolink lines under construction in Chorlton, seen here at St Werburgh's Road station.
